name: Purifying Cleanse
overrideDescription: Restore [effect0.power] health and apply [burnout] [effect1.status0.power] to a friendly unit.
cardLoreTooltips: Before entering a wax drip and applying new wax, a process I've been told is called "guttering", Waxers are asked to cleanse themselves of any blemishes and impurities to keep the wax as clean as possible.
